trans-unit.source: Describes how abstract content is mapped into a concrete format.
trans-unit.target: 描述抽象內容如何對應至具體格式中。

trans-unit.source: This abstract class forms the base class for the following classes:
trans-unit.target: 此抽象類別 form 下列類別的基底類別：

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `MessageBinding` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的典型用法`MessageBinding`類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />，目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> 為其中的成員。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> is a member.

Each of the classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) element (`<input>`, `<output>` or `<fault>`) enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which is in turn enclosed by the `<binding>` element.
trans-unit.target: 每個類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>類別會對應到 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 項目 (`<input>`，`<output>`或`<fault>`) 括住`<operation>`項目，接著括在`<binding>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class corresponds to that `<operation>` element in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding>類別會對應至該`<operation>`WSDL 文件中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。
